author: Arian Campo-Flores
title: Watching and Waiting for Coronavirus Surge at The Villages in Florida...
description: Watching and Waiting for Coronavirus Surge at The Villages in Florida... (Second column, 7th story, link ) Drudge Report Feed needs your support! Become a Patron
content: Residents of The Villages, a sprawling retirement community in central Florida, were still gathering in town squares, visiting nail salons and browsing an estate sale in late March. Only after Gov. Ron DeSantis issued a statewide stay-at-home order April 1 di… [+277 chars]
